name: Connectivity
description: Everything that allows devices to be connected.

name: Indicators and Output
description: Items in this group allows your device to talk to the world or indicate something (various audio/visual indicators).

name: Sensors and Input
description: Items in this group allows your device to get input from the world (various sensors, microphones etc.).

name: Mechanical
description: Items in this group allows your device to perform mechanical actions.

name: Switches
description: Items in this group allows your device to have various switches.
